functions.tag: {display:{Name:'["",{"text":"a","italic":false,"obfuscated":true},{"italic":false,"text":"巻き添えで封印された羊毛","color":"dark_red"},{"italic":false,"text":"a","obfuscated":true}]',Lore:['["",{"text":"かつて","italic":false,"color":"white"}]','["",{"text":"脅威","italic":false,"color":"green"},{"text":"と呼ばれた塔が","italic":false,"color":"white"}]','["",{"text":"この世界には存在した。","italic":false,"color":"white"}]','["",{"text":"塔は","italic":false,"color":"white"},{"text":"天","italic":false,"color":"aqua"},{"text":"より","italic":false,"color":"white"},{"text":"災禍","italic":false,"color":"red"},{"text":"を齎し、","italic":false,"color":"white"}]','["",{"text":"人々は塔の封印を試みた。","italic":false,"color":"white"}]','["",{"text":"苦難の末封印は成功し、","italic":false,"color":"white"}]','["",{"text":"塔はある寺院に封印された","italic":false,"color":"white"}]','["",{"text":"だが、その","italic":false,"color":"white"},{"text":"犠牲","italic":false,"color":"red"},{"text":"は決して","italic":false,"color":"white"}]','["",{"text":"少なくなかったのである…","italic":false,"color":"white"}]','[""]','["",{"text":"そして、これはとても","italic":false,"bold":true,"color":"dark_red"}]','["",{"text":"やわらかいのである。","italic":false,"bold":true,"color":"dark_red"}]']},Enchantments:[{lvl:10,id:fire_aspect},{lvl:120,id:sharpness}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Amount:20,Slot:offhand,UUID:[I;-12477,57475,141152,-114950],Name:1723008149907},{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Amount:1,Slot:offhand,UUID:[I;-12477,57775,141152,-115550],Name:1723008149907}],HideFlags:35}
